tool_description: Generates cryptographic hashes of documents using various algorithms to ensure document integrity and support digital signing workflows.

document_path.description: Path to document for hash generation

hash_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm to use: SHA256, SHA512, MD5, or SHA1

include_metadata.description: Include document metadata in hash calculation

error_messages: File not accessible: Cannot read document file for hash generation.
Unsupported hash algorithm: Specified hash algorithm is not supported or recognized.
Hash generation failed: Error occurred during cryptographic hash calculation.
usage: Provide document_path and optionally specify hash_algorithm. Set include_metadata to incorporate document metadata in hash calculation. Returns cryptographic hash values.

hash_value.description: Generated cryptographic hash of the document

file_size.description: Size of the hashed document in bytes
